headline: Invitation Homes Promotes Tim Lobner to Chief Operating Officer
summary: DALLAS, February 25, 2025--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company") today announced the promotion of Timothy J. Lobner to Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, effective March 2. Charles D. Young will continue in the role of President.
